entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,901Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 729

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: What We Could Be
entry.summary:
Author: SaltyJoy

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,243Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 11

Summary: There was a point where you liked Dick Grayson as a kid, but you knew he never reciprocated those feelings, so you forced yourself to move on. When Dick finds out years later, he can't help but feel conflicted. Struggling with his own feelings, he wonders if he is too late to figure out his own. Do you still love him, or does he need to win you back? Chapter two is the Dick Grayson ending, and chapter three is the Jason Todd ending. Pick your poison, or just read both.

entry.title: Another Star in Gotham's sky (Keep shinning and maybe I will see you)
entry.summary:
Author: mellewyin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,195Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: “Hey, star…” Jason paused, deliberately, cautious, trying to be as controlled as never, knowing he would catch if Jason slipped his fear. “Yeah?” The boy answered, not quite paying attention, too busy washing the dishes from their last meal. Jason tries to count how many times he faced this exact scene, how many times he sat on this exact counter, eating as he saw the college student doing some domestic activity while the speaker played an old song (actually, was it jazz? was it blues? what the heck was it playing anyway?). It kind of made him hesitate more — not from discomfort, not really. It was something… something softer. Gentler even (When was the last time he felt someone being gentle with him? Jason doesn’t even need to think. He knows it was with him. Always with him.) It somehow made the things worse, made the ache on his heart hurt more, the thorns on his throat sting more. Still, he needed to ask. “Why…” Oh God, why was it so difficult? “Why you keep taking care of me?" He didn’t want to hear the answer, he already knew, and it was what he hated more.AKA civilian!reader taking care of Red Hood injuries every night <3

entry.title: It shouldn't bother you...
entry.summary:
Author: Honey_bellie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,153Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 10

Summary: You have just moved into Gotham a few months ago, you have a new house, a teaching job at a new school, a new sense of normality. Still you couldn't help but feel something is wrong with this city, with you and it wasn't just the fact you were in the number one "avoid at all costs living here" city. You felt empty, alone, until a interesting someone, Jason, entered your life, but still, he seemed to have some secrets, some repressed feelings, traumas that might just ruin the only thing good in your new life or maybe... it just might make your relationship stronger? And who is this Red Hood person that keeps apearing when you need.

entry.title: An Ode to reunions
entry.summary:
Author: Fung1cida

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,763Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: She had thought, all those years, that she was crazy like mommy. The doctors explained so. Schizophrenia tends to runs in the families. She can’t run faster than that. But if it was only that, just bad hallucinations, why did Jason die at the end? He was just another lost kid in the same street she lived at. She still lives there. If it was just mommy’s illness, why did she feel him die in her own bones? Even worse: why did she feel him come back to life? Or, Red Hood meets a probably neurotic woman obssesed with the idea she could have stopped his death. Jason Todd comes back to life and it feels like it alwats did in the begining: forceful, miserable, and confusing.

entry.title: Of Crowns and Swords
entry.summary:
Author: anastasia1513

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,292Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: You were raised side by side in a palace that taught you how to rule and him how to kneel. You loved him without restraint; he loved you enough to refuse. When duty, bloodlines, and lies tear you apart, the world decides your story for you—and buries it under devotion, tragedy, and rumor. Years later, a kingdom still whispers about a dead princess and an executed knight. Somewhere beyond its borders, the truth moves quietly, sharpened by grief and survival. Some loves do not fade. Some names are erased on purpose. And some ghosts are not done haunting the world that tried to forget them.

entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,077Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. entry.title: I Look in People's Windows
entry.summary:
Author: emmacchiatoo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,263Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Sol Alvarez-Ferrer didn’t come to Gotham to be a headline.She came to observe. New city, new job, and a last name people recognize before they recognize her. Armed with a camera, a notebook, and a habit of noticing what others overlook, Sol begins to map a city that watches back. Gotham doesn’t give itself away easily. Some people notice her.Some linger.Some protect her from the shadows. And once you notice someone—it’s hard to look away.

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,398Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 497

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.
